lyrics.stanza: Worthy is the Lamb Who has been slain to receive The power and riches and wisdom and strength And honor and glory and blessing.
Worthy is the Lamb Who has been slained to receive The power and riches And wisdom and the strength And honor and glory And the blessing.
Worthy is the Lamb Who has been slain to receive The power and riches and wisdom and strength And honor and glory and blessing.
Saints, stand as one; No one should backward turn. The battle Christ has won, By His blood we overcome, The enemy cast down For the Lamb is on the throne.
And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb And by the word of their testimony, And they love not their soul-lives unto death.
Praise You, Lion-Lamb Our Captain of salvation. You have fought the battle And destroyed the Devil. You took away our sins And accomplished redemption.
Hallelujah to our Lamb God on the throne! Hallelujah Praise Him! Hallelujah Hallelujah Praise Him! Hallelujah
Lord, I join Your fight. For Your purpose take my rights! To You, I now respond, In this age to overcome, To the end make me fight on. Fight on, fight on, fight on!
